div.p: Maximum clade credibility tree of Plasmodium cyt‐ b (477 bp) lineages recovered from western Himalayan birds in India. Posterior clade probability support values above 0.5 are shown. 12 Plasmodium lineages found in western Himalayan birds are in red text, and 27 reference Plasmodium lineages from MalAvi database (Bensch et al., 2009) are in black text
